name: @briebug/jest-schematic
description: Add jest to an Angular CLI project

scripts.build:clean:launch: yarn build && yarn clean && yarn launch
scripts.test: yarn build:clean:launch && yarn test:sandbox && yarn clean
scripts.test:sandbox: cd ../../sandboxes/single-app && yarn lint && yarn test --no-cache && yarn build
scripts.debug:
echo "debug not setup with @angular/schematics
> node --inspect-brk $(which schematics) .:addJest"

author: Briebug
